original: @336a * // nor rgyun ma'i smon lam bzhugs//
analyzed: @336a * // nor rgyun ma'i smon lam bzhugs//
translated: The Aspiration of Vasudhara

original: # // sangs rgyas la gus rang bzhin g-yo sgyu med //
analyzed: # // sangs rgyas la gus rang bzhin g-yo sgyu med //
translated: Respectfully devoted to the Buddha, naturally free of deceit and guile,

original: sems can kun la byams shing stong par goms //
analyzed: sems can kun la byams shing stong par goms //
translated: Loving all sentient beings, familiar with emptiness,

original: rnam grol 'bras bur ldan la kun nas chags //
analyzed: rnam grol 'bras bur ldan la kun nas chags //
translated: Fully attached to the fruition of liberation,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rno ba can //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rno ba can //
translated: The bodhisattva with sharp wisdom,

original: shin tu che ba'i rigs skyes gzugs mdzes pa //
analyzed: shin tu che ba'i rigs skyes gzugs mdzes pa //
translated: Born into a very great family, with a beautiful form,

original: bdag ni skye ba skye bar bde gshegs kyi //
analyzed: bdag ni skye ba skye bar bde gshegs kyi //
translated: In all my lives, may I be born in a family🔽With a great deal of wealth, and be skilled in the arts,🔽A poet, incomparable, vast,

original: snyan dngags mkhan po mnyam med rgya chen dang // tshe ring rigs skye skyes bu blo gros gsal //🔽mkhas shing blo gros mi dman bcom ldan gyi //
analyzed: snyan dngags mkhan po mnyam med rgya chen dang // tshe ring rigs skye skyes bu blo gros gsal // mkhas shing blo gros mi dman bcom ldan gyi //
translated: Long-lived, born into a good family, with a clear mind,🔽Skilled, not of inferior intellect,

original: gsung rab la mkhas bde ldan snying rje can //
analyzed: gsung rab la mkhas bde ldan snying rje can //
translated: Learned in the scriptures of the Blessed One, happy, compassionate,🔽Full of faith, a poet,

original: rab tu dang 'gyur snyan dngags mkhan po dang // mar shes pha ma la gus nyid dang ni //
analyzed: rab tu dang 'gyur snyan dngags mkhan po dang // mar shes pha ma la gus nyid dang ni //
translated: Recognizing my mother and father, respectful to them,

original: rtag tu skye ba dran zhing tshul khrims ldan //
analyzed: rtag tu skye ba dran zhing tshul khrims ldan //
translated: Always remembering my past lives, and endowed with ethical discipline.

original: chos kyi bdag nyid nor ldan rab ster dang // bla med mkhas pa'i grogs dang ldan pa dang // spro ldan stobs @336b ldan dga' zhing mang pos bkur //
analyzed: chos kyi bdag nyid nor ldan rab ster dang // bla med mkhas pa'i grogs dang ldan pa dang // spro ldan stobs @336b ldan dga' zhing mang pos bkur //
translated: enthusiasm, strength, joy, and respect from many,🔽the abandonment of all illnesses,

original: nad rnams spangs shing sems cad thams cad la //
analyzed: nad rnams spangs shing sems cad thams cad la //
translated: the care of all beings,🔽the retention of what is heard,

original: rjes su 'dzin zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang // bsam pa dag cing bzod pa ldan pa de //
analyzed: rjes su 'dzin zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang // bsam pa dag cing bzod pa ldan pa de //
translated: pure intention, and patience—

original: ji srid 'jig rten phan pa 'byung ched du //
analyzed: ji srid 'jig rten phan pa 'byung ched du //
translated: for as long as the world is a source of benefit,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan go 'phang bgrod gyur pa //🔽de srid rtag tu yon tan 'di rnams ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan go 'phang bgrod gyur pa // de srid rtag tu yon tan 'di rnams ni //
translated: for as long as the state of a buddha bhagavān is attained,🔽for that long, may I always attain🔽all these qualities, adorned with all of them.

original: kun gyis brgyan pa bdag gis thob gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: kun gyis brgyan pa bdag gis thob gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Noble Lady Vasudharā.

original: rtog par gsungs pa'i cho gas yongs su bklags byas shing //🔽'dzin na rnam pa sna tshogs rin chen gser gyi rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: rtog par gsungs pa'i cho gas yongs su bklags byas shing // 'dzin na rnam pa sna tshogs rin chen gser gyi rang bzhin gyis //
translated: Recited according to the stated ritual,

original: khang pa stong phrag thams cad gang ba nyid du mdzad pa yi //
analyzed: khang pa stong phrag thams cad gang ba nyid du mdzad pa yi //
translated: if held, it fills all the thousand houses with various precious golden natures.

original: 'jig rten kun gyi yum gyur de la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi yum gyur de la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I respectfully bow to you, O Mother of the entire world.

original: lha mo khyod ni yon tan rin chen kun gyi gter chen te //
analyzed: lha mo khyod ni yon tan rin chen kun gyi gter chen te //
translated: O Goddess, you are a great treasure of all precious qualities,

original: sems can don mdzad nor dang 'bru rnams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: sems can don mdzad nor dang 'bru rnams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu //
translated: The cause of the abundance of wealth and grain that benefits sentient beings.

original: do shal cod pan ldan zhing nor bu dpag bsam shing rnams kyis //
analyzed: do shal cod pan ldan zhing nor bu dpag bsam shing rnams kyis //
translated: With necklaces, crowns, jewels, and wish-fulfilling trees,

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon mdzad nor 'dzin nor rgyun ma la 'dud //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon mdzad nor 'dzin nor rgyun ma la 'dud //
translated: I bow to Vasudharā, the protector of the three worlds.

original: nang dang 'jigs pa'i 'chi ba'i skyon mang sgrol //
analyzed: nang dang 'jigs pa'i 'chi ba'i skyon mang sgrol //
translated: You liberate from the inner and outer dangers of death,

original: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rma yi 'tsho byed sman //
analyzed: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rma yi 'tsho byed sman //
translated: The medicine that heals the wound of poverty's suffering,

original: skal bzang gzugs kyi yon tan rigs dang rus //
analyzed: skal bzang gzugs kyi yon tan rigs dang rus //
translated: The qualities of form, lineage, and family of the fortunate ones,

original: thams cad sbyin mdzad khyod kyi zhabs la 'dud //
analyzed: thams cad sbyin mdzad khyod kyi zhabs la 'dud //
translated: I bow to your feet, O Bestower of Everything.

original: gang zhig yang dag bla ma'i cho gas yongs su glog byed na //
analyzed: gang zhig yang dag bla ma'i cho gas yongs su glog byed na //
translated: For those who are consecrated by the ritual of the true guru,

original: phun tshogs yangs pa bde 'gro nye bar ster byed pa //
analyzed: phun tshogs yangs pa bde 'gro nye bar ster byed pa //
translated: You bestow the vast perfection and the happiness of the higher realms.

original: nor rgyun zhes pa'i ming can gzugs de la ni dus rtag tu //
analyzed: nor rgyun zhes pa'i ming can gzugs de la ni dus rtag tu //
translated: To that form known as Vasudharā, I bow always,

original: mtha' dag sems can phan par sems pas gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mtha' dag sems can phan par sems pas gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage with devotion to the one who wishes to benefit all sentient beings.

original: gang zhig yang dag dran las mi rnams longs spyod yun ring du //
analyzed: gang zhig yang dag dran las mi rnams longs spyod yun ring du //
translated: For those who are mindful of her, enjoyments increase for a long time.

original: rab tu 'phel zhing dbul dang nad dang sdig pa sel mdzad cing //
analyzed: rab tu 'phel zhing dbul dang nad dang sdig pa sel mdzad cing //
translated: She removes poverty, illness, and evil deeds,

original: dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa nor rgyun ming can de la'o //
analyzed: dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa nor rgyun ming can de la'o //
translated: and is like a wish-fulfilling tree, the one named Vasudharā.

original: 'gro la phan pa'i ched du gus pas spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'gro la phan pa'i ched du gus pas spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage with devotion to her, for the sake of benefiting beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa dang / smon lam dang bstod pa rnams rdzogs so /🔽// / tshul 'di ni dpang lo ts'a ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas zhol phug tu /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa dang / smon lam dang bstod pa rnams rdzogs so / // / tshul 'di ni dpang lo ts'a ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas zhol phug tu /
translated: The sādhana, the one hundred and eight names, the aspiration prayer, and the praise of the Blessed Lady Vasudharā are complete.🔽This was translated, revised, and finalized by the Indian preceptor Śīlendrabodhi and the great editor-translator Bandé Paltsek at the Zhöl Cave.

original: rgya dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa dang bskul ba po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin chen mtha' can yin no /
analyzed: rgya dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa dang bskul ba po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin chen mtha' can yin no /
translated: The scribe and instigator was the spiritual friend Rinchen Tseden.
